comments:
Couldn't reproduce it again, so I can not give a detailed description.
This is what happened:
1. After working in eclipse in a python project, close project and quit eclipse.
2. Error messages (two times): "resource /tools is not open" (happens frequently, in general without additional problems).
3. Reopen eclipse, install new plugin TeXlipse (version: 1.2.0)
4. Creation of new TeXlipse project in new workspace, work in the project, save and close the project.
5. Switch workspace
6. Eclipse closes new workspace and starts to open the old workspace.
7. Eclipse freezes while opening old workspace, with log error message : "resource ... is not open".

Workaround (after two days, by chance):
1. Start eclipse in new workspace (without problem)
2. DISABLE PyDev plugin
3. Switch workspace to old workspace (or close new workspace and open new, don't rembember exactly)
4. Old workspace open succesfully without PyDev
5. Enable again PyDev
6. It works again :)



System (Ubuntu Feisty)
- Eclipse Version: 3.2.2
Build id: M20070212-1330 (Ubuntu version: 3.2.2-0ubuntu3)
- PyDev version: 1.2.5
- Eclipse install location:  
/usr/bin/eclipse, /usr/lib/eclipse/
- Project location where the bug appears: /home/camilo/MORPHEX/csmVC/

-Error log:

I think you should report the issue here http://pydev.sourceforge.net/faq.html#how_do_i_report_a_bug first.
